Text: DVD Shrink crack sounds useful considering that DVD Shrink is freeware and doesn't need a crack.
No Kidding.  But maybe the uploader figures any one dumb enough to download a crack for DVD Shirink would be dumb enough to be running without Virus protection.
this crack is really working? i mean, i really need this crack? :S
